Tacoma.Chief Leschi School: Chief Leschi School is a Native American tribal school located in the Puyallup Valley near Mount Rainier in Washington. It is a 200,000-square-foot (19,000 m2) facility which is intended to be a model for Native American Education. It opened in 1996 serving Native American students from 92 different bands which comprise the Puyallup tribe of Indians.
